patch.Title: Website Rewrite
patch.Text: The website looks so freaking cool now! and the help page actually displays useful stuff

patch.Title: Launcher 1.3 UPDATE
patch.Text: Long awaited UI Update is finally here! Added UI and improved the app and added alot of stuff! including this news screen! and im too lazy to list everything here (forgive me)

patch.Title: HAPPY NEW YEAR!
patch.Text: Happy new year to everyone! a 5$ steam giftcard giveaway will start soon in our discord server so stay tuned my friend!
